scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder comprises several order forms from customers of John Wesley Hunt's general store in Lexington, Kentucky, requesting goods and money as well as business letters to John W. Hunt regarding debts, deliveries, and potential employees of the general store. There are also two bills of exchange to pay John W. Hunt and his business partner, Abijah Hunt, large sums of money along with bills and receipts for goods and deliveries for the general store.
